Hi! Editor's here! I hope that you enjoyed reading Paraphilia. ^^
As for me, I'm just passing to give you a little information. Some of you might already know this but there are still two doujins made by Azasuke that were left untranslated: Past Memory (C80) and Dressing Room (C90). Maybe someone will pick them up. But in the case that no one does, I already created a bounty on e-h in order to find a translator for Past Memory. However, and I will be honest with you all, Past Memory and Dressing Room aren't in my priorities so it might take a while.
